title: Stephen Malkmus - Face the Truth
description:
A word from scuzzbutt: I noticed one of my favourite Malkmus albums had vanished from The Bay, so I decided to upload it again after I found it for myself. I will seed this, please be patient, as my computer is not always on. Also, I take no credit for ripping this, I found it on Demonoid; I am just putting it back up, because I could swear it was here before.

A review by Pitchfork that enjoyed the album slightly less than me:
 <a href="
http://pitchfork.com/reviews/albums/5059-face-the-truth/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://pitchfork.com/reviews/albums/5059-face-the-truth/</a>

Tracklist:

1. Pencil Rot 4:08
2. It Kills 4:39
3. I've Hardly Been 2:56
4. Freeze The Saints 3:54
5. Loud Cloud Crowd 3:32
6. No More Shoes 8:00
7. Mama 3:11
8. Kindling For The Master 3:20
9. Post-paint Boy 4:08
10. Baby C'mon 2:44
11. Malediction 2:50

One more thing: I'm going to buy this album, I've certainly listened to it enough, check it out if you haven't heard it, or if you just need to hear it right now, then by all means, download and share. When I get the CD, I'll do a good FLAC upload, it deserves it.
